plot: This short lived (Sep 1971 - Dec 1971) series looked at the humorous side of married life using music and dance production numbers, and comedy sketches.
plot_en: This short lived (Sep 1971 - Dec 1971) series looked at the humorous side of married life using music and dance production numbers, and comedy sketches.
plot_es: This short lived (Sep 1971 - Dec 1971) series looked at the humorous side of married life using music and dance production numbers, and comedy sketches.
title: The Funny Side
